title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Home attendance, with a total of 14 data points.
Overall Home attendance has increased over the Year
Home attendance is roughly constant from 2006 to 2019.
The steepest stays the same occurs in between the Year 2014 and 2015.
Max Home attendance about 583184.0 was recorded at Year 2018
Min Home attendance about 493515.0 was recorded at Year 2014
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Home attendance, with a total of 14 data points. The chart has 5 significant trends.
The longest trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2010 to 2014.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2016 to 2019.
Also, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2014 to 2016.
Also, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2008 to 2010.
Additionally, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2006 to 2008.
